directive_name: FOUNDATION PHASE DAY 2 ACCEPTANCE - HOLD LINE, HARVEST TRUTH, PREPARE DAY 4 REVIEW

rationale: Governance holding: 0 violations, architecture freeze honored
Missing criterion: monotonicity (data problem, not motivation problem)

non_negotiable_until_day4: No exposure - no paper trades, no live trades
No migrations, no code changes, no policy changes, no gate tuning
Exception: Critical security or data integrity P0 only
Observation is the work - output is calibration truth, not activity

workstream_a.name: Calibration Root Cause
workstream_a.goal: Explain the inversion, not fix it

deliverables.name: Inversion Breakdown
deliverables.description: Top 3 drivers of high-confidence misses by forecast_type, horizon, asset bucket, regime bucket

deliverables.name: Miscalibration Map
deliverables.description: For 80-100% band: where does accuracy collapse by horizon, regime, asset cluster

deliverables.name: Hypothesis Set for Day 4 Review
deliverables.description: 3 plausible causes ranked: label/outcome mismatch, leakage/lookahead, confidence generation logic

workstream_a.constraint: No tuning, no parameter edits. Only forensic analysis.

deliverables.name: Horizon Eligibility Dashboard
deliverables.description: Counts: eligible vs not eligible vs overdue for 0h/24h/168h horizons

deliverables.name: ios001 Timeout Classification
deliverables.description: Prove low severity, non-governance-impacting. Propose Day 4 safe remediation if needed.

day4_review_agenda: Brier direction: enough pairs for 7-day slope?
Gate behavior: violations meaningful, ceilings justified, no drift
Decision readiness: if monotonicity fails, stay in observation

stig_confirmation.statement: Day 3 deliverables A, B, C are SCHEDULED and will be attached to the Day 3 Daily Report

vega_audit_confirmation.requirement: Audit trail for Day 3 diagnostic outputs captured as evidence artifacts
vega_audit_confirmation.method: Evidence JSON files - no DB writes required

ceo_message_acknowledged.key_insight: Restraint is not delay. Restraint is the mechanism that preserves freedom.
